p: This activity was also tested by Omar et al. [ 72] for compound 181, isolated from C. odorata wood, against the rice weevil, Sitophilus oryzae (L.) using a method developed by Xie et al. [ 95]. Four concentrations (0%, 0.05%, 0.25%, and 0.50% w/ w) were tested, however the authors reported that the compound was active at 0.50% ( w/ w), with a consumption of diet value of 31.2% ± 6.3% control ± SEM.
